channel.title: PSBug on Ravikanth Chaganti
channel.description: Recent content in PSBug on Ravikanth Chaganti

item.title: Slides: BITPro UG Meet - Tests Driven PowerShell Learning using PSKoans
item.description:
At todayâ€™s Bangalore IT Pro and PowerShell Bangalore User Group (PSBUG) event, I had the opportunity to showcase the PSKoans module by Joel Sallow. This module has a set of Pester tests that you have to fix as you proceed in your efforts towards mastering PowerShell.

I have found this method engaging and decided that I must show this to the community.

After this session on PSKoans, I did live coding and streamed it live on Twitch (and did not realize that it was without audio :((). I fixed a function in my PSWindowsAdminCenter module and added a new function.
